quotes.quote: What friends or kindred can be so close and intimate as the powers of our soul, which, whether we will or no, must ever bear us company?
It is only kindred griefs that draw forth our tears, and each weeps really for himself.
A family stitched together with love seldom unravels.
Kindred objects kindred thoughts inspire, as summer clouds flash forth electric fire.
Kindred weaknesses induce friendships as often as kindred virtues.
He who understands you is greater kin to you than your own brother. For even your own kindred neither understand you nor know your true worth.
All living things on earth are kindred.
If you hire relatives, you'll have a payroll that won't quit.
Blood relatives often have nothing to do with family, and similarly, family is about who you choose to make your life with.
The clan is nothing more than a larger family, with its patriarchal chief as the natural head, and the union of several clans by intermarriage and voluntary connection constitutes the tribe.
Family is a transitive property.
A family needs a father to anchor it.
Even a family needs to work as a team.
A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
The family is more sacred than the state.
The family is the nucleus of civilization.
The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
The family is a haven in a heartless world.
When the family dies, the nation follows...
The family is the corner stone of our society.
The family is where most of our joy comes from.
Family likeness has often a deep sadness in it.
Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
Family... a group experience of love and support.
No family is ever what it seems from the outside.
Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
A large family makes you accept sharing your parents.
The greater the kindred is, the lesse the kindnesse must bee.
Family makes a house a home.
Family time is the best time.
Family is a place where love never ends.
Family pride entertains many unsocial opinions.
Kindred spirits alone do not change with the changing years.
Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
Sticking with your family is what makes it a family.
No family is perfect, and that's true. None of us are.
A family has its own rituals and its own superstitions.
Searching for our kindred dead isn't just a hobby. It is a fundamental responsibility for all members of the Church. We believe that life continues after death and that all will be resurrected.
